pageContext.claim: “Look, you're going to lose a number of people to the flu. But you're going to lose more people by putting a country into a massive recession or depression. You're going to lose people. You're going to have suicides by the thousands.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump suggests that the death toll from measures to prevent the spread of covid-19 could also be high. Estimates of the death toll from suicides related to the Great Recession are far lower than the mortality levels for covid-19. A study in the British Journal of Psychiatry estimated 10,000 suicides related to the 2007-09 economic downturn across North America and Europe.
